comments.body: I might be missing something, but was there supposed to be an export somewhere?

So it turns out that everything inside a `declare module` is implicitly exported by default, which is why you get the lint error when you mark it explicitly.

I think you should drop the surrounding `declare module '@google-cloud/kms { ... }` — at least, as long as the tests still pass without it. I think your path mapping in the tsconfig will take care of converting "@google-cloud/kms" to "google-cloud__kms".

Thanks for the help and review @sandersn. Sorry for no replies to the initial message, I wasn't at my desk all day. 

I made the changes you suggested. I have resubmitted the PR

For the tabs vs spaces, we might want to change the documentation on https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped
> Formatting: Either use all tabs, or always use 4 spaces

 as you are correct DT has a definite preference for spaces.
